name: Where's Zoey?
description:
Where's Zoey is an interactive art piece with a narrative. The prototype requires players to play through attentively, paying attention to every aspect in order to piece the entire story together.

It is a uni project created by four game artists who struggled to program...  We tried to create a prototype where the environment tells the story. We also used this chance to experiment with the Voxel (3D pixel art) software to create assets.

Developers:
Arielle Lee - Instagram
Yi Zhang (Zoey)
ManMan Yu (Arwen)
YingYao Li
